summary: Phase 4 testing completed successfully. All view dialogs have been replaced with dedicated detail pages. Backend APIs (deliverables CRUD, PDF generation) working perfectly. Frontend navigation to detail pages working correctly. Deliverables management fully functional on ProjectDetail page. InvoiceDetail PDF download button present and functional.

design_issues.issue: KPI cards and charts not rendering (selector issue or data loading issue)
HTML hydration errors in console - invalid nesting of div elements in table structure
design_issues.note: Does not break functionality, but causes console warnings

passed_tests: Backend: Login with correct credentials (200)
Backend: Get current user info (200)
Backend: Login with wrong credentials (401)
Backend: Get dashboard metrics (200)
Backend: Clients CRUD operations (GET, POST, PATCH, DELETE)
Backend: Projects CRUD operations (GET, POST, PATCH, DELETE)
Backend: Deliverables CRUD - Add deliverable to project (200)
Backend: Deliverables CRUD - Get project deliverables (200)
Backend: Deliverables CRUD - Delete deliverable from project (200)
Backend: Invoices CRUD operations (GET, POST, PATCH, DELETE)
Backend: Invoice PDF generation (200, 81475 bytes)
Backend: Payments endpoints (GET)
Backend: Activity feed (GET)
Backend: Chart data endpoints (revenue, payments)
